com.wiris.quizzes.api.assertion

Interface Syntax

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface Syntax
extends Serializable
    This object represents the expected syntax for the author answers and the student's answer in a given Slot.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    See Also:
    SyntaxName, SyntaxParameterName

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SyntaxName getName()
      Returns the name of this syntax assertion.
      java.lang.String getParameter(SyntaxParameterName name)
      Gets the value of a parameter in this syntax assertion.
      java.lang.String removeParameter(SyntaxParameterName name)
      Removes a parameter from this syntax assertion, setting its value back to the default value.
      void setParameter(SyntaxParameterName name, java.lang.String value)
      Sets a parameter's value for this syntax assertion.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.wiris.quizzes.api.Serializable

        serialize

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        SyntaxName getName()
        Returns the name of this syntax assertion.
        Returns:
        The name of this syntax assertion.

      • setParameter

        void setParameter(SyntaxParameterName name,
                java.lang.String value)
        Sets a parameter's value for this syntax assertion.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the parameter.
        value - The value of the parameter.

      • getParameter

        java.lang.String getParameter(SyntaxParameterName name)
        Gets the value of a parameter in this syntax assertion.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the parameter.
        Returns:
        The value of the parameter. If it is not set, it returns the default value.

      • removeParameter

        java.lang.String removeParameter(SyntaxParameterName name)
        Removes a parameter from this syntax assertion, setting its value back to the default value.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the parameter.
        Returns:
        The value of the parameter before being removed.
